aircraft.value: Pegasus Swift - AC-3702-325 at Forward Operating Base-2

defect_observed.value: Circuit breaker tripping under normal load. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 30/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 31/10/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

Part - III: (Defect Details)

a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
